Uses android built-in Alarm Clock. *Caution*: Will override silent/vibration modes and keep ringing until shut off Pick the sound to be played Play a sound when price alert is tripped Vibrate when price alert is tripped Color for widget background Disable updates when device is sleeping Replace High/Low with Bid/Ask if supported by exchange %1$s price will be displayed in this currency Select the currency pair displayed on the widget Default currency for OrderBook and Price Graph Automatically selected when Bitcoinium opens Enable notifications when price alert is tripped (widget needs to be active) Enable Price Alert Select the exchange used for the widget Provide anonymous data in order to help the developers improve Bitcoinium When the price graph is scrolled, max and min values will be readjusted to maximize viewing Enable notifications when total hashrate is below 0.01 Mh/s Text will be colored GREEN if depth over this value Text will be colored RED if depth under this value Text will be colored YELLOW if depth is in between Color of text depends on depth Changes all BTC widget prices to mBTC. \nEx: $1010.00 will show as $1.010 \nDoes not affect other crypto-currencies Required to access your miner\'s information Use Price Alert settings to enable sound and vibration during notification Enables use of notification drawer tickers Enable tickers in the notification drawer \n*Note*: Respective widget needs to be active Display currency symbols in the orderbook. \nDisable if text does not fit. Limit values printed on screen to improve performance OrderBook list length limit Select the units used to display payout Notifies when price crosses threshold \n*Note*: Respective widget needs to be active Price Alert Notifications Exchange and Currency Ratings, reviews and feedback are greatly appreciated! Time interval between widget updates \n *WARNING* \nUpdating the widget more often will increase battery drain Select the mining pool used for the widget Tapping the widget will update instead of opening app Color of the update time if failed Color of the update time if successful Various display and power saving settings Color for Exchange name and Last Price text Color for High, Low and Volume text Put the theme into effect %1$s tickers" %1$s alert limits" %1$s %2$s upper limit %1$s %2$s lower limit Notification will occur price goes over this value Notification will occur if price goes below this value
